      • update

        @Deprecated
public BaasioUser update()
                  throws BaasioException
        Deprecated. 
        Update user entity from baas.io. If update current user entity, use update(context) function instead.
        Returns:
        Updated entity
        Throws:
        BaasioException

      • updateInBackground

        @Deprecated
public void updateInBackground(BaasioCallback<BaasioUser> callback)
        Deprecated. 
        Update entity from baas.io. If update current user entity, use updateInBackground(context, callback) function instead. Executes asynchronously in background and the callbacks are called in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        callback - Result callback

      • update

        public BaasioUser update(android.content.Context context)
                  throws BaasioException
        Update user entity. If user is same with signed-in user, cached signed-in user data will be updated.
        Returns:
        Updated entity
        Throws:
        BaasioException

      • updateInBackground

        public void updateInBackground(android.content.Context context,
                      BaasioCallback<BaasioUser> callback)
        Update user entity. If user is same with signed-in user, cached signed-in user data will be updated. Executes asynchronously in background and the callbacks are called in the UI thread.
        Parameters:
        callback - Result callback

        Parameters:
        email - Email or username or user's uuid to reset password

        public static boolean resetPassword(java.lang.String email)
                             throws BaasioException
        Proceed sending email for reset password.
        Parameters:
        email - Email or username or user's uuid to reset password
        Returns:
        If true, email for reset password has been sent successfully.
